de.hu.gralog.structure
Class Structure<V,E,GB,G extends ListenableGraph<V,E>>

java.lang.Object
  de.hu.gralog.structure.Structure<V,E,GB,G>
Type Parameters:
V - the vertexType
E - the edgeType
GB - the Structure-Bean-Type
G - the JGraphT-Type, which has to implement ListenableGraph
public class Structure<V,E,GB,G extends ListenableGraph<V,E>>
extends Object

This class represents a GrALoG-Structure.

A GrALoG-Structure is basically a mathematical graph-structure that has arbitrary properties for it's vertices, edges and the structure itself. In GrALoG this is accomplished by using the JavaBeans-Framework to define vertices, edges and so called Structure-Bean-Objects. It follows that vertices, edges and Structure-Beans are seen by GrALoG as JavaBeans allowing them to be hugely customizable, i.e. having arbitrary properties and providing their own GUI-Components that allow the GrALoG-User to change these properties.

As mentioned above a Structure in GrALoG is represented by an instance of this class, which serves the following proposes:

  • It holds the mathematical graph-structure, i.e. the vertices and edges belonging to that GrALoG-Structure. GrALoG uses JGraphT to store the graph-structure, thus each GrALoG-Structure has an associated JGraphT-graph, that can be retrieved via getGraph().
  • It provides methods to create it's vertices and edges. See createVertex() and getEdgeFactory().
  • It holds the so called Structure-Bean-instance, which can be seen as the holder of properties that belong to the whole structure. The Structure-Bean can be retrieved via getStructureBean().
  • It listens to changes on it's vertices, edges and Structure-Bean and forwards them to the listeners registered with this structure. See getPropertyChangeSupport() respectively getDisplayChangeSupport().
    • It provides the functionality for the user to select vertices and / or edges and informs listeners on changes to this selection. See getStructureSelectionSupport().
  • It allows GrALoG to draw the structure using the renderers provided by getVertexRenderer() and getEdgeRenderer().

Plugin-Developers

Please refer to StructureTypeInfo if you are interested in defining your own GrALoG-Structure-Type.

Author:
Sebastian

registerBean

protected void registerBean(Object bean)
Adds listeners to vertices, edges or GraphBean

Parameters:
bean -

getGraph

public G getGraph()
Returns:
the associated JGraphT-Graph

getPropertyChangeSupport

public StructurePropertyChangeSupport getPropertyChangeSupport()
Returns:
StructurePropertyChangeSupport, that you can use to add and remove PropertyChangeListeners to/from this structure. These listeners are informed about all changes to vertices, edges and Structure-Bean belonging to this structure.

getDisplayChangeSupport

public StructureDisplayChangeSupport<V,E> getDisplayChangeSupport()
Returns:
StructureDisplayChangeSupport, that you can use to add and remove DisplayChangeListeners to / from this structure. These listeners are informed about all changes to vertices, edges and Structure-Bean belonging to this structure.

getStructureSelectionSupport

public StructureSelectionSupport<V,E> getStructureSelectionSupport()
Returns:
StructureSelectionSupport, that you can use to add and remove SelectionListeners to this structure. These listeners are informed whenever the user changes his selection of vertices / edges in the structure. You can also retrieve the currently selected vertices / edges from this object.

getName

public String getName()
Returns:
the name of the underlying StructureTypeInfo

getStructureBean

public GB getStructureBean()
Returns:
the Structure-Bean, if any, registered with this GrALoG-Structure

isStructureEditable

public boolean isStructureEditable()
Returns:
if true GrALoG allows the user to edit the properties of the Structure-Bean

getVertexFactory

public VertexFactory<V> getVertexFactory()
Returns:
the VertexFactory used by this GrALoG-Structure to construct new vertices

getTypeInfo

public StructureTypeInfo<V,E,GB,G> getTypeInfo()
Returns:
the StructureTypeInfo associated to this GrALoG-Structure. Can be used to construct new GrALoG-Structures of the same type by using StructureFactory.createStructure(StructureTypeInfo)^

addVertex

public boolean addVertex(V v)
Adds a vertex to the underlying JGraphT-graph. This method is used internally by GrALoG and should not be called by Plugin-Developers - you should use the addVertex-method of the underlying JGraphT instead.

Parameters:
v -

addEdge

public boolean addEdge(V s,
                       V t,
                       E e)
Adds an edge to the underlying JGraphT-graph. This method is used internally by GrALoG and should not be called by Plugin-Developers - you should use the addEdge-function of the underlying JGraphT-Graph instead

Parameters:
s - the sourceVertex
t - the targetVertex
e - the edge
